realms.name: The Trust Bridge
realms.description: A collaborative puzzle experience where teams must share information discovered in separate chambers to unlock a bridge together. Perfect for teaching the importance of communication, information sharing, and trust in teamwork.
realms.author: Realm Engine Team
learningObjectives: Practice clear communication of discovered information
Experience the value of exploring different paths and sharing findings
Understand that some challenges require multiple perspectives
Learn to combine individual discoveries into team solutions
